<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Primal Breadth](/Feats.aspx?ID=706) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 225 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Druid](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=6)

**Prerequisites**
[Basic Druid Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=702)

</column>

---

Increase the spell slots you gain from druid archetype feats by 1 for each spell level other than your two highest druid spell slots.
name: Primal Breadth
